name: ListCustomerPayments
description:
List all payments made by your customers.

Use this tool to retrieve a list of all the payments made by your customers. It is useful for financial analysis, reconciliation, or customer support purposes.

parameters.name: organization_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the organization. Required to specify which organization's payments to list.

value_schema.description: ID of the organization

parameters.name: search_customer_name
parameters.description: Filter payments by customer name using 'startswith' or 'contains' variants. Max length: 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search payments by customer name. Variants: customer_name_startswith and customer_name_contains. Max-len [100]

parameters.name: search_by_reference_number
parameters.description: Search payments by reference number. Supports 'startswith' and 'contains' variants. Max-length 100.

value_schema.description: Search payments by reference number. Variants: reference_number_startswith and reference_number_contains. Max-len [100]

parameters.name: payment_date
parameters.description: Specify the date of the customer payment in YYYY-MM-DD format to filter results.

parameters.name: payment_amount_filter
parameters.description: Filter payments by amount using variants: less_than, less_equals, greater_than, or greater_equals.

value_schema.description: Search payments by payment amount. Variants: amount_less_than, amount_less_equals, amount_greater_than and amount_greater_equals

parameters.name: search_by_customer_notes
parameters.description: Search payments using customer notes, supporting 'startswith' and 'contains' variants.

value_schema.description: Search payments by customer notes. Variants: notes_startswith and notes_contains

parameters.name: payment_mode_filter
parameters.description: Filter payments by specifying the payment mode. Use 'startswith' or 'contains' for partial matching.

value_schema.description: Search payments by payment mode. Variants: payment_mode_startswith and payment_mode_contains

parameters.name: filter_payments_by_mode
parameters.description: Filter payments by the payment mode. Accepted values include: All, Check, Cash, BankTransfer, Paypal, CreditCard, GoogleCheckout, Credit, Authorizenet, BankRemittance, Payflowpro, Stripe, TwoCheckout, Braintree, Others.

value_schema.description: Filter payments by mode.Allowed Values: PaymentMode.All, PaymentMode.Check, PaymentMode.Cash, PaymentMode.BankTransfer, PaymentMode.Paypal, PaymentMode.CreditCard, PaymentMode.GoogleCheckout, PaymentMode.Credit, PaymentMode.Authorizenet, PaymentMode.BankRemittance, PaymentMode.Payflowpro, PaymentMode.Stripe, PaymentMode.TwoCheckout, PaymentMode.Braintree and PaymentMode.Others

parameters.name: sort_column
parameters.description: Specify the column to sort the payments by. Common options include date, amount, or customer name.

parameters.name: search_term_for_payments
parameters.description: Search payments by reference number, customer name, or payment description. Maximum length is 100 characters.

value_schema.description: Search payments by reference number or customer name or payment description. Max-length [100]

parameters.name: customer_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the customer involved in the payment. Use this to target specific customer transactions.

value_schema.description: Customer ID of the customer involved in the payment.

parameters.name: page_number_to_fetch
parameters.description: The page number of payment records to be retrieved. Defaults to 1.

value_schema.description: Page number to be fetched. Default value is 1.

parameters.name: records_per_page
parameters.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default is 200.

value_schema.description: Number of records to be fetched per page. Default value is 200.
